PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-02742013-03-07TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Port Authorities Operations Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the PORT AUTHORITIES OPERATIONS REGULATIONS in order to (1) enable the OSHAWA PORT AUTHORITY to carry out its duty to maintain the safe and orderly operation of the port; and (2) make the French and English versions of section 27(1)b and section 31(1)(c) of the Regulations consistent.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0042 Publication Date: 2013-03-27
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Port Authorities Operations Regulations
precis: Regulations amending the PORT AUTHORITIES OPERATIONS REGULATIONS in order to (1) enable the OSHAWA PORT AUTHORITY to carry out its duty to maintain the safe and orderly operation of the port; and (2) make the French and English versions of section 27(1)b and section 31(1)(c) of the Regulations consistent.
